resources.string: Connect to Knowledge, Find Education LearnPage.net is a bridge connecting students and educational institutions together, you will find all courses and training.

FreeHour is one hour knowledge sharing session presented by volunteer experts in various fields. 
 Be part of the session: 
 - Select your FreeHour session 
 - Register online 
 - First come first serve (limited chairs) 

 If you are an expert and want to volunteer please contact us at freehour@learnpage.net

Find sessions in 	Freehour.learnpage.net
Find conferences and workshops in Sudan. Be connected at \tgoevent.learnpage.net
